title: 8 Course Meal For The Soul
description: 8 Course Meal for the Soul is a story of a celebrity Chef Evan who lives in Manhattan, New York City. He fulfilled all his dreams of winning Executive Chef Jersey to become a renowned chef all these years from being a college graduate in Brooklyn College to an owner of most cherished restaurant chain in USA. He was living a happy life with wife Julia and his children Sofia and Eric until an incident took place which left him with a new goal of preparing 8 Course Meal for the Soul. His best friend and business partner Ryan helped him to accomplish his new goal. What follows is an inspiring journey of Evan who is in search of perfect ingredients for his 8 Course Meal for the Soul. We hope you will enjoy this very special cuisine of Evan and it will entertain and nourish you while tantalising taste buds of your Soul and you savour the taste forever.
author: Praveen Agarawal
